 <img width="100px" src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/18262199" align="center" alt="Github Avatar" />
 <h2 align="center">Github 常用徽章合集</h2>
 <p align="center">Github Badge Collection</p>
</p>

### 1. [Shields 徽章](https://shields.io/)

Shields 适用于各类现有的、或自定义名称的徽章。

```
样式参数：
style=plastic
style=flat
style=flat-square
style=for-the-badge
style=social
```

#### 1.1 品牌类

```
https://img.shields.io/badge/左侧文字-右侧文字-颜色?logo=图标

样式参数：?style=flat
图标库支持主流品牌、也可以使用 base64 嵌入自定义图标
图标支持 logoColor 参数设置颜色，但文字不支持设置颜色
```

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Windows-10-2376bc?style=flat&logo=windows&logoColor=ffffff)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/IDE-Visual%20Stdio-blueviolet?style=flat&logo=visual-studio&logoColor=ffffff)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/IDE-Visual%20Studio%20Code-blue?style=flat&logo=visual-studio-code&logoColor=ffffff)

#### 1.2 语言类

```
https://img.shields.io/badge/-左侧文字-右侧文字-颜色?logo=图标

样式参数：?style=flat-square
图标库支持主流品牌、也可以使用 base64 嵌入自定义图标
图标支持 logoColor 参数设置颜色，但文字不支持设置颜色
```

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-C-A8B9CC?style=flat-square&logo=C&logoColor=ffffff)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Java-007396?style=flat-square&logo=java&logoColor=ffffff)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Python-3776AB?style=flat-square&logo=Python&logoColor=ffffff)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Markdown-000000?style=flat-square&logo=Markdown&logoColor=ffffff)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-LaTex-3776AB?style=flat-square&logo=LaTex&logoColor=ffffff)

#### 1.3 自定义类

```
https://img.shields.io/badge/文字-颜色?logo=图标

样式参数：?style=for-the-badge&logo=appveyor
图标库支持主流品牌、也可以使用 base64 嵌入自定义图标
图标支持 logoColor 参数设置颜色，但文字不支持设置颜色
```

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/图筑风暻-ED8384?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/小喵心语-EEA3A0?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)

### 2. [GitHub Readme Stats](https://github.com/anuraghazra/github-readme-stats)

#### 2.1 个人卡片

```
https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=用户名
```



![](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=pudding0503&show_icons=true&count_private=true&hide=prs&theme=default_repocard)

#### 2.2 仓库卡片

```
https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=用户名&repo=仓库名
```

![](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=bitcookies&repo=winrar-keygen&theme=graywhite)

#### 2.3 用户语言比例

```
https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/top-langs/?username=用户名

宽度参数：?card_width=445
```

![](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/top-langs/?username=pudding0503&layout=compact)

### 3. 访问量和趋势

#### 3.1 访问量

```
https://api.visitorbadge.io/api/visitors?path=链接 
```

![](https://api.visitorbadge.io/api/visitors?path=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fpudding0503%2Fpudding-illustration&label=%E6%B5%8F%E8%A7%88%E9%87%8F&labelColor=%23152136&countColor=%23ff8a65)

```
https://profile-counter.glitch.me/用户名/count.svg
```

![](https://profile-counter.glitch.me/pudding0503/count.svg)

```
https://api.moedog.org/count/@用户名.readme
```

![](https://api.moedog.org/count/@pudding0503.readme)

#### 3.2 [Star 趋势卡片](https://github.com/caarlos0/starcharts)

```
https://starchart.cc/用户名/仓库名.svg
```



![](https://starchart.cc/caarlos0/starcharts.svg)

#### 3.3 个人贡献版

```
https://ghchart.rshah.org/用户名
```



![](https://ghchart.rshah.org/pudding0503)

#### 3.4 [贡献人员卡片](https://contrib.rocks/preview)

```
https://contrib.rocks/image?repo=用户名/仓库名
```

![](https://contrib.rocks/image?repo=bitcookies/winrar-keygen)

### 4. 天气

```
https://weather-icon.journeyad.repl.co/@城市
```

![](https://weather-icon.journeyad.repl.co/@beijing)
